thread.title: Man City superstar Sergio Aguero to resist Real Madrid interest despite being left out by Pep Guardiola
thread.title_full: Man City superstar Sergio Aguero to resist Real Madrid interest despite being left out by Pep Guardiola

author: Jack Rathborn
title: Man City superstar Sergio Aguero to resist Real Madrid interest despite being left out by Pep Guardiola
text:
Sport Man City superstar Sergio Aguero to resist Real Madrid interest despite being left out by Pep Guardiola The Argentinian could be of interest to the European champions with Gabriel Jesus impressing on his full debut vs West Ham Share Sergio Aguero is 'very happy' at Man City (Photo: Reuters) Share Get Real Madrid CF updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Sergio Aguero is set to commit his future to Manchester City and ignore interest from Real Madrid. 
The Argentinian was left out of the starting line-up midweek at the London Stadium with Pep Guardiola preferring youngster Gabriel Jesus. 
City ran out 4-0 victors with Raheem Sterling and Leroy Sane flanking the Brazilian starlet in a fluid display, with Real Madrid readying a move for Aguero. 
But the 28-year-old's agent insists the player is content at the Etihad and will resist any offers this summer. Gabriel Jesus is challenging Aguero for a place in the team (Photo: Kent Gavin/Daily Mirror) Read More Demanding Pep Guardiola making life tougher for Manchester City, admits Yaya Toure 
“Yes, he is very, very happy – he will be there next season," Hernan Reguera told the Guardian. 
Aguero's representative responded with 'no problem' when pushed on whether Aguero had an issue with Guardiola preferring Jesus, though an extended spell on the bench could change matters. 
Gabriel scored and assisted on his full debut and will now be keen to keep his place over Aguero for this weekend's game against Swansea. poll loading Who would you choose if you were Pep Guardiola? 0+ VOTES SO FAR Sergio Aguero - his class is proven! Gabriel Jesus - he's the future! Like us on Facebook
